snippet.title: Forged in the Barrens Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
The road before us winds through vast, sun-scorched lands, bringing danger and discovery beyond imagination’s grasp. The Barrens are the anvil upon which the Horde as we know it was founded: A literal crossroads where the tauren, trolls, and orcs came together for the first time. Heroes are made here. Perhaps you, too, shall be Forged in the Barrens.

LOK’TAR OGAR! Forged in the Barrens will launch worldwide this Spring with 135 new collectible cards, the new Frenzy keyword, Spell Schools, Ranked Spells and so much more!

• Learn more about Forged in the Barrens: https://playhearthstone.com/expansions-adventures/forged-in-the-barrens/

• Read the 19.6 Patch Notes: https://playhearthstone.com/news/23624689
